settings.title: Booksellers
settings.subtitle: SELL BOOKS AND EMPOWER CHANGE WITH EVERY SALE
settings.text: Selling books has never been easier. Once you receive your Booksio branded storefront, the world is your oyster! Our white-labeled store becomes your newest revenue opportunity. 10% of every purchase made on your storefront is now yours to play with. Whether it's donating the commission to a charity you are passionate about or investing it back into your brand, our branded stores offer something for everyone.

settings.title: Your Branded Storefront
settings.text: Millions of titles available for you to promote on a Booksio store co-branded with your company logo.

settings.title: Customize Your Selection
settings.text: Eliminate any book categories you'd like to exclude.

settings.title: Pick Your Preferred Charity
settings.text: Have a cause that speaks to you? Elect to donate 10% of each purchase on your storefront to the charity closest to your heart.

settings.title: Something For Everyone
settings.text: Bring the power of books and magazines to your audience

settings.title: How much does it cost to have a branded store?
settings.text: Booksio branded storefronts are completely free. We set up everything on our end and then pass on the store link to you to promote as you wish.

settings.title: How can my organization create a branded store?
settings.text: Interested organizations should submit this form and a member of our team will be in touch shortly.

settings.title: Can I limit which titles can be purchased through our storefront?
settings.text: Yes — Booksio partners have the option to limit their storefronts to show or exclude certain authors, titles, or topics.

settings.title: Sign up to create a Booksio Branded Store today.
